name: Skeuomorphic Audio Controller UI
description:
This is a recreated skeuomorphic interface of the web synthesizer (subtract.one) made by Julius Sohn. The interface in this file is a digital translation of the Sansui AU-D707 Integrated Amplifier. 

Hope this file helps understand the techniques behind making skeuomorphic interfaces inside Figma.
Share and spread the love!

If you have any suggestions/inputs/ideas, please feel free to DM me on Twitter.

www.twitter.com/HckmstrRahul
www.dribbble.com/HckmstrRahul
